title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
u by giving you wyvern poison to swallow if you feel symptoms. This will give you the following dialogue options.

I thought you could cure me? What about that branch of yours? I swear. All right. Hand it over, No, I'm not taking poison from a woman I can't trust.

Choosing dialogue 1 reveals that the thorns are coated with fatal toxins in case she couldn't trust you, she did not have a cure for you and makes you swear to her that you'd take the poison if needed. Choosing dialogue 2 gains the ap
